title: Ep 272 | Phil's Miraculous Snake-Evasion Tale & What Jase Really Wants to Find While Metal Detecting
description:
Phil reveals why he won't play golf, and Jase admits to being demoralized by his son's golf skills. Phil is delighted by what Jase's treasure-hunting buddy did with the 18th century Spanish real he unearthed. Jase's college experience didn't last long, but somehow he managed to get into an argument with the instructor in his first-aid class. Phil describes a snake encounter that led to a gravity-defying leap. Jase explains why the last chapter of Romans should be read first and what his metal-detecting goal is. And the story of Phil's meeting with a purple-haired girl has a great ending.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
